name: Draconus
overview: Draconus is set on an alien planet ruled by the Tyrant Beast who must be obliterated in the final screen of the game. To get to that stage the mysteries and magical forces, which unfold before you must be understood and harnessed to progress through this multi-screen epic. On your journey through the labyrinthine complex you'll meet various nasties such as Giant Rats, Bats and Sea Serpents, together with a sprinkling of Terrortoads and ferocious Catepelones. To help you are many useful artefacts like the Demon Shield, Necromancer's Staff, Dragon's Eye, and Morph Helix. Flasks of Flame Fluid, Energy Crystals and many Spells help you on your way.
